name: Mini Healer
description:
Mini Healer is an MMO inspired RPG where you play as the healer in a party and challenge various bosses in the dungeon. Added with ARPG inspired loot system and deep character customization.


Features:
  • 35 unique bosses to challenge
  • Over 350 unique artifacts to collect
  • Over 23 spells to customize
  • In-depth skill trees with 3 classes and over 100 nodes
  • In-depth Crafting system to upgrade and modify artifacts collected
  • Over 150 achievement bonuses to collect
  • Simple procedurally generated end game dungeons
